item.title: Dragonsong Preperation Thoughts
item.description: Currently, I lead a static called High Score. As we’re limited in hours this time around, I decided to consider what would be the best use of our time going into the new Ultimate. The following is a collection of my thoughts. Best-in-Slot (for healers) When progressing through Savage, you’re normally limited to whatever you can get your hands on. Then you go through and meld to hit comfortable spell/skill speed, piety, or whatever else stat you want to focus on.
